mapper.select: select * from (select @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum, photo_table.* from photo_table, (select @rownum:=0) r where mem_id=#{mem_id} and photo_status='n' and photo_num=#{photo_num} order by photo_date)sub order by sub.rownum desc
mapper.insert: insert into photo_comment_table (photo_comment_num, mem_id, comment_content, comment_date, comment_updatedate, comment_status, photo_num, mem_id2) values(photo_comment_num, #{mem_id}, #{comment_content}, now(), now(), 'N', #{mem_id2})
